Class DefaultActionConfig

  • java.lang.Object
    • jodd.madvoc.action.DefaultActionConfig
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ActionConfig
    Direct Known Subclasses:

    public class DefaultActionConfig
extends java.lang.Object
implements ActionConfig
    Default action configuration used for the Action annotation.
